titles.title: Fire Fighter Higher Education Incentive Act of 2007
To provide loan forgiveness under the Federal Perkins Loan program for Federal, State, and local firefighters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

bill.summary:
11/9/2007--Introduced.
Fire Fighter Higher Education Incentive Act of 2007 - Amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to cancel the Perkins loans of full-time federal, state, and local fire fighters.
